pr_title: feat(go): GoMod extractor now retrieves and applies replacement data …

timeline.message: feat(go): GoMod extractor now retrieves and applies replacement data (IDETECT-1966)

timeline.bodyText: I would change one of the versions in the list output. Then assert on that version so that we know the replacement is working.
timeline.author: JakeMathews
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,24 @@ protected void setup() throws IOException {
         );
         addExecutableOutput(goListOutput, "go", "list", "-m");

+            "\t\"Version\": \"v1.0.0\"",
+            "}",
+            "",
+            "{",

timeline.bodyText: Have you considered using a POJO here?
timeline.author: JakeMathews

timeline.message: feat(go): added battery test for go mod
feat: Edited go list -u -json input to test replacement functionality
feat: Use POJO instead of generic JsonElement
feat: Use TypeToken to avoid iterating over JsonArray
